item.title: Workshops
item.description: At Biotop*, we develop a variety of workshop concepts for everyone who would like to gain a hands-on experience of science. Microscopes If you are interested in building your own microscope and want to learn how to use it, join us for one of our Foldscope workshops. Dates upon arrangement Cost: 15â‚¬ incl. your own paper microscope Spectroscopes If you're curious about how light can be separated into its spectral colors, join us for a workshop aimed at building paper-based spectroscopes.
